# HextaUI - Modern UI Component Library
# https://hextaui.com llms.txt

## Overview
- [HextaUI Website](https://hextaui.com/): Create stunning websites quickly with customizable UI components.
- [HextaUI Introduction](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/getting-started/introduction): Build modern websites quickly with customizable UI components.
- [HextaUI Showcase](https://hextaui.com/showcase): Discover HextaUI Blocks for faster website building.
- [HextaUI Sponsors](https://hextaui.com/sponsors): Find sponsors and support for HextaUI projects.

## Getting Started & Installation
- [HextaUI Installation Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/getting-started/installation): Learn to install HextaUI in your Next.js project quickly.
- [HextaUI Next.js Setup](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/installation/nextjs): Install and set up HextaUI in Next.js projects easily.
- [HextaUI Vite Installation](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/installation/vite): Install and set up HextaUI in Vite projects easily.
- [HextaUI Astro Installation](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/installation/astro): Install and set up HextaUI in your Astro project.
- [HextaUI Roadmap Overview](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/getting-started/roadmap): Explore HextaUI's roadmap, achievements, and future plans.
- [HextaUI Changelog](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/getting-started/changelog): Latest updates and improvements for HextaUI project.

## Foundation & Theming
- [HextaUI Components](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/foundation/components): Explore HextaUI's extensive library of UI components.
- [HextaUI Base Components](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/everything-by-hextaui/base-components): Discover HextaUI's customizable base components for web development.
- [HextaUI Theming Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/foundation/theming): Customize HextaUI components' appearance with themes and colors.
- [HextaUI Color Palette](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/foundation/colors): Explore HextaUI's consistent color palette for components.

## Foundation/Primitive Components
- [Button Component Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/button): Explore various button styles, states, and usage examples.
- [Input Component Overview](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/input): Input component with features like password toggle and validation.
- [Enhanced Textarea Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/textarea): Multi-line text input with clearable, auto-resizing features.
- [Checkbox Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/checkbox): Customizable checkbox component with various states and usage examples.
- [Customizable Radio Group](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/radio): Customizable radio group component with flexible layouts and animations.
- [Switch Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/switch): Toggle between checked and unchecked states with animations.
- [Toggle Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/toggle): A toggle component for on/off states with variants.
- [Select Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/select): Comprehensive select component with icons and animations support.
- [Styled Form Labels](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/label): Label component for forms with styling and accessibility features.
- [Input OTP Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/input-otp): Customizable one-time password input component for web applications.
- [Tag Input Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/tag-input): Flexible tag input component for managing multiple tags easily.
- [File Upload Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/file-upload): Versatile file upload component with drag-and-drop support.
- [Customizable Slider Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/slider): Customizable slider component for numeric value selection.
- [Color Picker Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/color-picker): Comprehensive color picker component with multiple input methods.
- [Card Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/card): Flexible card component for displaying content effectively.
- [Responsive Data Table](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/table): Feature-rich data table component with sorting and filtering.
- [Badge Component Overview](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/badge): Versatile badge component for displaying various statuses and labels.
- [HextaUI Avatar Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/avatar): Explore HextaUI's Avatar component for user representation.
- [Chip Component Overview](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/chip): Interactive chip component for status, categories, and filters.
- [Keyboard Shortcuts Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/kbd): Keyboard key component for shortcuts and key combinations.
- [Progress Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/progress): Versatile progress component for tracking loading and completion states.
- [Loader Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/loader): Elegant loading spinner component with various sizes and colors.
- [Skeleton Component Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/skeleton): Use Skeleton components to enhance loading states visually.
- [Tooltip Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/tooltip): Interactive tooltip component for displaying contextual information.
- [HextaUI Navigation Menu](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/navigation-menu): Explore HextaUI's navigation menu for efficient website navigation.
- [Breadcrumb Navigation Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/breadcrumb): A comprehensive guide to implementing breadcrumb navigation.
- [HextaUI Tabs Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/tabs): Explore HextaUI Tabs for modern, animated content sections.
- [Pagination Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/pagination): Efficiently navigate through multiple pages with pagination controls.
- [Menubar Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/menubar): A horizontal menu bar component for navigation and actions.
- [Command Menu](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/command-menu): Command palette component for quick actions and navigation.
- [Accordion Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/accordion): Interactive accordion component for organizing content efficiently.
- [Separator Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/separator): A versatile separator component for visually dividing content.
- [Customizable Sidebar Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/sidebar): Explore a customizable sidebar component for web applications.
- [Resizable Panel Components](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/resizable): Create resizable panel groups and layouts easily.
- [Custom Scroll Area](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/scroll-area): Customizable scroll area component with smooth scrolling features.
- [Tree View Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/tree): Flexible tree view component with collapsible nodes and animations.
- [Modal Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/modal): Accessible modal component with smooth animations and examples.
- [Customizable Drawer Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/drawer): Customizable drawer component with smooth animations and flexible positioning.
- [Dropdown Menu Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/dropdown-menu): Explore a versatile dropdown menu component with accessibility.
- [Toast Notifications](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/toast): Customizable toast notifications for web applications with examples.
- [Alert Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/alert): Versatile alert component for notifications and important messages.
- [Calendar Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/calendar): Comprehensive calendar component for date selection and management.
- [Date Picker Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/date-picker): Flexible date picker component for single and range selection.
- [Video Player Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/video-player): Customizable video player with full controls and shortcuts.
- [Scrolling Marquee Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/ui/components/marquee): Smooth scrolling marquee component for continuous content display.

## OG Blocks - Animation Effects
- [HextaUI Blocks Overview](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/all-blocks): Explore reusable and customizable HextaUI blocks for projects.
- [Animated Cursor Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/animation/cursor): Animated cursor component for smooth mouse pointer tracking.
- [Infinite Text Marquee](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/animation/infinite-text-marquee): Create an infinite text scrolling effect with HextaUI.
- [Particle Animation Guide](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/animation/particle): Create interactive particle animations for web applications.
- [Spotlight Card Animation](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/animation/spotlight-card): Create spotlight effect on hover for card components.
- [Gradient Beam Animation](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/animation/gradient-beam): Animated gradient beam component for web development projects.

## OG Blocks - Text Effects
- [Animated Underline Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/text/animated-underline): Add animated underline effects to your text components easily.
- [Staggered Blur Effect](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/text/blurred-stagger): Create staggered blur effects for text elements easily.
- [Shining Text Effect](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/text/shining-text): Create captivating shining text animations for websites.
- [Typewriter Text Animation](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/text/typewriter): Create typewriter text animations easily with HextaUI.

## OG Blocks - Application Components
- [Expandable Tabs Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/application/expandable-tabs): Create expandable tabs with smooth transitions for websites.
- [Post Card Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/application/post-card): Create social media post cards effortlessly with HextaUI.
- [Animated Dock Component](https://hextaui.com/docs/og-blocks/application/animated-dock): Create animated docks with hover effects for icons.

## Site Resources
- [Hextaui UI Components](https://hextaui.com/sitemap-0.xml): Explore Hextaui's comprehensive UI components and animations.
- [Hextaui Sitemap](https://hextaui.com/sitemap.xml): Comprehensive sitemap for Hextaui website navigation.
